Xtransco InfoIn preparation for your Wednesday meeting with Heath here are some supporting documents Will be calling on Tuesday to answer any questions This is the main argument and rebuttal document This is the document Heath presented to his investment advisory board incl Lay and Whalley This is a presentation describing the current skills of the team and ensuing organizational structure of the deal Some backup numbers on valuation this is IdleAires and Xtranscos note they are based on different business models Some backup documentation on fuel idling burn we are conducting tests with Grady Olson that are yielding the same results and results from a prelim survey we conducted on truck drivers regarding their views and interest in value prop note these results are very roughyou should receive a better version before your meeting no Wednesday I will be in Lake Tahoe starting Wednesday morning but am reachable on my mobile Hamd Alkhayat ps still have not been able to connect with Bill Fowler

Summary of IdleAire commercial termsDanny This is the summary of the commercial terms proposed to IdleAire all the terms are still subject to further negotiation with IA We think we have something solid to work with provided we receive mm in total funding over next mos I greatly appreciate your continued support and your help in finding us some capital Cheers Hamd
